entry.title: Octopress_github_pages
entry.content:
use Octopress for github, all refer from http://beyondvincent.com/blog/2013/08/03/108-creating-a-github-blog-using-octopress/ meet a error when rake deploy: error: failed to push some refs to

how to resolve: cd _deploy git push -f 强推送过去

创建并部署博文的一个完整过程： $ rake new_post[“New Post”] $ rake generate $ git add . $ git commit -am “Some comment here.” $ git push origin source $ rake deploy
